original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen, analytical problem-solving, and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for ensuring that our systems and configurations accurately reflect and support complex business processes, driving efficiency and effectiveness across the organization. Your focus will be on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging cutting-edge technologies like machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver tangible results.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders from various departments to thoroughly understand business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business needs into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting any related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and devise effective solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Hands-on experience in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, with a deep understanding of data mappings, integrations, and system workflows

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java programming language, allowing you to understand and work with the underlying system architecture
- Expertise in SQL, enabling you to effectively query databases, generate reports, and analyze data to drive informed decision-making
- Experience in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to enhance system capabilities and optimize business processes

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis, system configuration, and technical implementation
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical solutions within complex enterprise environments
- Experience in the vehicle configuration industry or a related domain, demonstrating a deep understanding of the unique challenges and opportunities within this space

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience in vehicle configuration systems, providing a strong foundation for understanding the specific requirements and nuances of this domain

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Expertise in data modeling, integration, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks and platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and cross-functional team environment, with regular interactions with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to work effectively in an Agile setting, adapting to changing priorities and requirements
- Willingness to take on a hands-on, proactive role in driving system enhancements and process improvements
- Strong commitment to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices

Role Overview:
This is a unique opportunity to leverage your exceptional analytical and technical skills to drive transformative change within our organization's vehicle configuration systems. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between complex business requirements and effective technical solutions, ensuring that our systems accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of the business. Your expertise in data analysis, system configuration, and process optimization will be essential in unlocking new levels of efficiency and innovation, positioning you as a strategic partner in the organization's success.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to thoroughly understand and document business requirements, using techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows to capture the nuances of complex operational needs
- Translate these business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the application of configuration best practices and innovative solutions
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization to drive data-informed decision-making
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) and collaborating with developers and IT support to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing maintenance
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support the organization's knowledge base and enable future enhancements
- Foster strong relationships with cross-functional teams, including developers, IT support, and other stakeholders, to ensure seamless collaboration and the successful delivery of technical solutions

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex business problems and devise effective, data-driven solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in documenting and analyzing business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Hands-on experience in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, with a deep understanding of data mappings, integrations, and system workflows

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java programming language, allowing you to work closely with the underlying system architecture and explore innovative technical solutions
- Proficiency in SQL, enabling you to effectively query databases, generate reports, and perform advanced data analysis to drive informed decision-making
- Experience in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to enhance system capabilities and optimize business processes within the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis, system configuration, and technical implementation within a complex enterprise environment
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical solutions, with a focus on driving efficiency and innovation
- Demonstrable experience in the vehicle configuration industry or a related domain, showcasing a deep understanding of the unique challenges and opportunities within this space

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience in vehicle configuration systems, providing a strong foundation for understanding the specific requirements and nuances of this domain

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Expertise in data modeling, integration, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks and platforms, and their application in the vehicle configuration context

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and cross-functional team environment, with regular interactions with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to work effectively in an Agile setting, adapting to changing priorities and requirements, and contributing to the continuous improvement of processes and systems
- Proactive and solution-oriented mindset, with a strong commitment to driving innovation and delivering tangible business impact
- Ongoing learning and professional development to stay at the forefront of industry trends and best practices

Role Overview:
As a technical configuration expert in the vehicle configuration space, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring that our systems accurately reflect and support the evolving business needs of the organization. This position requires a unique blend of analytical acumen, technical proficiency, and a deep understanding of complex business processes. You will be responsible for collaborating with cross-functional stakeholders, translating their requirements into effective system configurations, and driving continuous improvements to enhance efficiency and performance. Your ability to leverage data-driven insights, identify optimization opportunities, and implement innovative solutions will be crucial in positioning our organization as a market leader.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders from various departments to thoroughly understand their business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate these business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization to drive data-informed decision-making
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the application of configuration best practices and the implementation of innovative solutions, such as the integration of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) and collaborating with developers and IT support to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing maintenance
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support the organization's knowledge base and enable future enhancements
- Foster strong relationships with cross-functional teams, including developers, IT support, and other stakeholders, to ensure seamless collaboration and the successful delivery of technical solutions

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex business problems and devise effective, data-driven solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in documenting and analyzing business requirements using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Hands-on experience in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, with a deep understanding of data mappings, integrations, and system workflows

Preferred Skills:
- Expertise in Java programming language, allowing you to work closely with the underlying system architecture and explore innovative technical solutions
- Proficiency in SQL, enabling you to effectively query databases, generate reports, and perform advanced data analysis to drive informed decision-making
- Experience in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to enhance system capabilities and optimize business processes within the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a role that blends business analysis, system configuration, and technical implementation within a complex enterprise environment
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical solutions, with a focus on driving efficiency, innovation, and measurable business impact
- Demonstrable experience in the vehicle configuration industry or a related domain, showcasing a deep understanding of the unique challenges and opportunities within this space

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience in vehicle configuration systems, providing a strong foundation for understanding the specific requirements and nuances of this domain

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficiency in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Expertise in data modeling, integration, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Power BI, Tableau)
- Familiarity with machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks and platforms, and their application in the vehicle configuration context

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative and cross-functional team environment, with regular interactions with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to work effectively in an Agile setting, adapting to changing priorities and requirements, and contributing to the continuous improvement of processes and systems
- Proactive and strategic mindset, with a strong commitment to driving innovation and delivering measurable business impact
- Continuous learning and professional development to stay at the forefront of industry trends and best practices, and to explore new technologies and methodologies that can enhance the organization's competitive edge
